Epic Hero Game Patch 0.525 (preview-build)
* bugfix: getting killed by getting sliced in half would result into broken gamestate, where you couldnt restart the game
* bugfix: fix issue with laserbeam aiming
* bugfix: fix issue where slicing in half particles would cause water to get rendered on top of ground
* bugfix: stat list was not accounting the stats coming from gear
* bugfix: issues with most upgrades in the game
* bugfix: fix issue with water debree

* feature: equipable onhit effects
* feature: flaming cape that adds fire aura
* feature: equipable fire on hit
- sets ground on fire with melee
- turns energy projectile into flames
* feature: equipable freeze on hit

* feature: equipable laser
- turns projectiles into laserbeams
- turns swords into laser swords that cut enemies in half

* feature: basic minimap 
* feature: equipable grappling hook
* feature: axe that deals damage based on missing health
* Feature: upgrade that lets you hit more than 1 target with 1 melee attack
* Feature: upgrade that lets you add base strenght to your basic attacks

* change: viking helmet now has 100% crit chance
* change: inventory description now uses icons for stats instead of text
* change: levelup only happens between waves of enemies, not during 
* change: dashes are now more limited in the early levels
* change: jump animation is now different
* change: when interacting with inventory, enemies are now instantly paused
* change: pause enemies when camera is panning from enemy introduction
* feature: add loading screen
* bugfix: weapons were not detecting collisions with the ground properly
* change: improve menu UI
* change: improve pausemenu UI
* change: when in idle weapon collisions are taken into account
* bugfix: weapons were not detecting collisions with the ground properly
* change: improve menu UI
* change: improve pausemenu UI
* change: when in idle weapon collisions are taken into account
* change: minimap now display where player and the camera is looking at
* change: minimap now displays if the monster is boss or normal character
* change: minimap now displays friendly monsters in green
* bugfix: damaging enemies more than once
* feature: add manawell
* change: picking up xp now restores 1 stamina and 1 mana
* bugfix: projectile goes missing against miniharolds
* bugfix: heavy attacks no longer limit targets

* bugfix: with mobility skills not draining stamina properly
* bugfix: powerup would not automatically release if key was pressed too quickly
* bugfix: lifesteal upgrade was not increasing health after upgrading to it 
* bugfix: long distance knockback was not accounting for target mass, causing enemies to get always shot far away
* bugfix: enemies can no longer run around when inventory is open

* Feature: Ability to limit how many individual enemies take damage per melee hit
* Feature: Knockback damage, each time target hits ground during hit, deal extra damage
* Feature: Special attacks can never be blocked
* Feature: Enemies that got shot into other enemies during knockback will also knock them out for brief second
* Feature: when charging a heavy attack, display strength bar
* Feature: when damage wasnt dealt, show either "miss", or "blocked" instead of always "miss"

* Balance: jump is now significantly weaker if you use it with no stamina
* Balance: double jump now costs 5 stamina

Epic Hero Game Patch 0.53 (preview-build)
* change: hitbox collider now checks if there is ground between you and the target before dealing damage
* change: ronnie and durco now stop chasing you if you dodge in good enough range
* change: you need to clear at least 4 waves before difficult enemies start spawning in
* feature: add tooltips to inventory
* feature: add medium sized harold
* feature: add gun minion
* feature: add sphagetti monster

Epic Hero Game Patch 0.54 (preview-build)
this patch primarly focuses on adding basic progression into the game
* new mechanic: timer that scales enemies based on how long the game is running
* new mechanic: item actives - basically a new skill that is gained when you equip an item
* new mechanic: lootchests are now individual inventories and spawn items randomly
* new mechanic: items now have the following tiers: common, uncommon, rare, legendary
* change: special attack UI rehaul to match inventory UI design
* change: ability master now only offers upgrades to special attacks
* change: flight utility is now gained when equipping a cape
* change: grappling hook utility is now gained when equipping grappling upgrade


* feature: water can transition into lava, and will start damaging anything that enters lava
* bugfix: fix an issue where melee attacks would sometimes calculate dash direction incorrectly
* bugfix: fix an issue where collider was not ignoring correct layers
* bugfix: fix an issue with rock projectile exploding at the start
* bugfix: fix an issue with telekinesis not finding target automatically
* feature: option to turn off shadows
* feature: option to turn off bloom
* feature: option to fullscreen game
* feature: option to switch resolution of game

# Epic Hero Game Patch 0.55 (preview-build)


* feature: hubworld where you go between levels
* feature: charging a heavy attack, and then jumping, now maintains height, if flight is unlocked
* change: gravity is now immediately applied, unless player has flight unlocked
* change: sprinting is now possible by holding down ctrl
* change: increase base movementspeed by 30%
* change: 0 stamina no longer impacts movement skills
* change: jumping is no longer reduced when equipping heavy armor
* change: allow movement after hitting enemy, making the combat feel bit more fluid


* change: character legs animate when attack animations are about to fade out
* change: reduce crit and damage on viking helmet
* change: inventory closes with esc
* change: freeze now only lasts for 5 seconds, and cannot be immediately stacked on top of existing freeze
* change: health, stamina, and mana are now saved in player progression, which means they will persist between levels
* change:  temporarely disable FSM monster as it is too buggy at the moment
* change: temporarely disable staff as its not functional at the moment
* change: harold spawns at a random point in his roaming zone
* change: knockback no longer clears ragdoll velocities at the end (this can still be toggled in settings)
* bugfix: text is properly contained inside tooltips
* bugfix: fires not setting things on fire
* bugfix: enemies would sometimes get stuck in hitstop state, making their animations invisible
* bugfix: interacting with items outside of range is no longer possible
* bugfix: issue where entities would not rotate properly at start
* bugfix: beam is available in the special attack shop again
* bugfix: manawell can now be interacted with more than once
* bugfix: dying now clears the last run properly
* bugfix: harold now roams the world properly again
* bugfix: enemies not actually following the path they had calculated
* bugfix: moving during boss introduction is no longer possible

* bugfix: death upgrades now work again
* bugfix: disable camera that was used for minimap, improving performance
* bugfix: water particles are no longer leaking, improving performance
* change: when a new enemy is spawned, it will only spawn 1 monster at a time, so player gets a chance to learn what it does
* bugfix: player no longer immediately attacks after selecting a levelup upgrade
* change: crit is now displayed as % in the hud
* change: crit is now an upgrade you can get in the levelup menu
* change: f11 now toggles the entire onscreen UI, instead of just player HUD
* bugfix: stats are now displayed correctly in the hud, after leveling up a skill
* bugfix: bigger projectiles no longer collide with the player character, which was causing them to shoot into random places
* change: improve balance when charging projectiles

* feature: apples now grow on trees, and can be collected to restore health
* bugfix: enemies are no longer spawning in the hubworld
* bugfix: mountains are no longer spawning out of nowhere
* bugfix: remove console log spam caused by powerup effect, causing lag
* bugfix: remove console log spam caused by the water effect, causing lag
* change: ascended projectile now will destroy everything on its path, and then roll to the aimed position, if it hit the ground during its flight

* change: water sfx now work in the hub world
* bugfix: movementspeed is now properly visible in stat ui
* change: bob no longer deals max health damage
* bugfix: death screen should be visible again, after getting sliced in half
* change: elemental magic is now positioned better, and the gathering animation is faster
* bugfix: charge projectiles were still colliding with the player, causing the trajectory to change from aimed position
* change: strength is now applied automatically, without having to do heavy attacks
* bugfix: shield was not spawning on find items death upgrade
* bugfix: find items only applies when loading into hub world now
* bugfix: issue where gear would sometimes stay visible when closing inventory
* change: special attack interface now highlights the path the player has taken
* bugfix: issue where procedural physics legs would not find proper step position when walking inside a cave
* change: long distance knockback is now significantly easier to trigger
* bugfix: remove floating grass

# Epic Hero Game Patch 0.555 (preview-build)


* change: add option to turn on experimental content, this option enables items that are determined to be too unstable for use, for first time players, but are there for experimentation purposes
* change: heavy attacks now increase stats by 10x, instead of giving raw knockback boost, its visible in the stat UI
* change: shark now starts spawning after 5 minutes of gameplay
* bugfix: shark model is no longer bugged
* change: inventory now contains item tier data
* change: item tooltips now display item stat changes properly with different itemtiers
* change: item names now have I to indicate item tiers
* change: manawell now display interaction particles to indicate when its off cooldown
* bugfix: player now just dies, instead of getting destroyed (preventing replaying), when going out of bounds of the map
* bugfix: player no longer dies when unequipping upgraded chestplate
* bugfix: player now ragdolls properly when they die, instead of standing still
* bugfix: cape no longer gets stuck in the player body when flying
* bugfix: object outlines now render properly, instead of getting blocked by the water
* bugfix: collision hit detection with shortsword is now more reliable
* dynamic hitboxes no longer allocate memory at runtime

# Epic Hero Game Patch 0.556 (preview-build)


* strength is now more predictable how it impacts the target
* bugfix: melee dash constraints are now taken into consideration properly
* bugfix: durco tan cap is no longer beyond bugged
* bugfix: durco tan cap now drops his hat again, when hitting him to the head
* bugfix: ronnie no longer speeds up like crazy when attacking
* bugfix: interacting with the boat in the start of the game now loads the next map properly
* bugfix: heavy attack stat increase only impacts the player
* change: when hitting enemies, physics steps is increased for the duration of the knockback to help with ragdoll bugs
* change: enemy jumps are now little bit more predictable, and have more control in code
* change: miniharolds (now named jurdald), now has its healthbar visible
* change: levels for enemies are now calculated properly
* change: levels are randomly rolled for enemies between 1-5 * minutes in game
* change: you can now only interact with trees, if you have increased the size of your character

# Epic Hero Game Patch 0.557 (preview-build)
* change: rare and legendary items, now need 20 minutes or 30 minutes of gameplay, before they start spawning in chests
* bugfix: killing harold by knocking them out of the world spawns the portal into nowhere
* bugfix: heavy energy blasts dont destroy props
* bugfix: remove debug cube when dashing with a cape
* change: health and damage is now 10x
* change: lifesteal upgrade is now 10% instead of 100%
* change: vengeance upgrade is now 10% instead of 100%


* change: shockwave is now an equipable item that works with projectiles and with fists
* change: harold now has 5000 defence
* change: standard projectile aiming is now better
* change: standard projectile now has an explosion
* bugfix: fire created by the player, no longer deals damage to the player
* change: stamina upgrade is now accessable through powerup menu
* change: projectiles have trails now
* change: bow arrow no longer destroys ground on hit
* change: magic damage is now option in levelup
* change: stat upgrades are now 10% of your total stats, including gear
* change: powerup upgrades are no longer accessable through levelup menu
* change: magic hat now has magic damage
* change: projectile size and speed upgrades now have proper icon

# Epic Hero Game Patch 0.558 (preview-build)
* change: roll is now 2x speed
* change: attack rotation speed is 2x
* change: bow now has proper bow sound effects
* change: fixed edge case with melee aim assist
* change: physics legs assistance is used for slopes, making player movement feel better
* bugfix: shockwave was not in the list of possible upgrades
* bugfix: crystals were not loading in the ui after you finished the game once
* bugfix: timer is no longer passing in the hub world
* bugfix: ui announcer now accounts for sfx volume properly
* bugfix: fix physics glitch when player is landing from high distance
* bugfix: enemies should no longer be spawning under rocks
* bugfix: the punch of medium sized jurdald now properly deals damage again
* bugfix: jurdlad jump hitbox now respects the character position properly
* bugfix: characters are now using speculative collision mode by default, which should help with getting stuck during jumps and such
* change: climbing trigger angle is now more precise
* change: halting knockbacks is now possible, which means that if your attackspeed is high enough, you can keep comboing the target even with very high strength

# Epic Hero Game Patch 0.56 (preview-build)

* new-feature: portal has been changed to a space ship that will take you to space, displaying the whole planet, where you can choose the island to save. the islands display difficulty levels, to help with the difficulty curve scaling.
* new-feature: compass that displays points of interest after main objective of levels has been completed
* change: level loading is now using a different loading pipeline, making loading speeds 100x faster
* change: enemies now level up, making them stronger, if you dont get rid of them
* bugfix: ascended projectile damage, now scales, depending how big the projectile is.
* bugfix: lifesteal and other passive upgrades, now work properly again
* bugfix: pressing esc on death screen, no longer unpauses the enemies
* bugfix: fix issue with grass spawning grass in the air when the level is loaded
* change: powerup base stat multiplier reduced from 5 to 2
* bugfix: you can no longer interact with gamey during level completion cutscene
* change: hubworld progress is now kept on death
* change: bosses are only introduced once per run
* change: ui now has a text to indicate when levelups are available
* change: flight can now be controlled with "ad" keys to move sideways
* change: flight can now be animation cancelled with abilities, keeping the flight active during 
charging other spells
* change: jurdalds jump now spawns a shockwave
* bugfix: fix jitter that would sometimes happen when player would jump immediately after hitting a monster
* bugfix: exit animation transition is less snappy now
* bugfix: player can no longer walk through destructed props (building, big rocks, etc), this might also improve performance in general
* bugfix: jurdlads abilities were not accounting for their stats
* bugfix: ronnies abilities were not accounting for their stats
* bugfix: durco tan caps abilities were not accounting for their stats
* bugfix: water splash now has a limited size 
* bugfix: fix an edge case where introduced boss hasnt attached their feet to the ground, causing them to slide when they are boing introduced
* bugfix: player muscles now use projection, which should help with solving physics edge cases
* bugfix: basic spellcast now animates legs properly again
* bugfix: cape is no longer as glitchy in build
* change: fire damage is now 10x more effective to reflect the 10x more health change
* change: apples now heal 10x to reflect the 10x health change
* bugfix: you can no longer walk inside of a chest after interacting with it
* change: hitting a will with a long distance knockback now replays the damage dealt with the first blow
